name: 2b2t.io Customizable Theme (Default: Dark)
description: I recommend using the Stylus browser extension. This is a simple customizable theme for 2b2t.io The default configuration is dark but it is fully configurable. If you like the look of any of the examples images their configurations are as follows: Text : FFFFFF Total: F5A623 Que: 006CFF Prio: FF0000 (Grey) Background: 414141 (Red) Background: 800000 (Green) Background: 008000 (Blue) Background: 000080
